description: Markers checklist shows paragraph markers with \marker prefix

structure.rowCountVariable: One row per paragraph in the range

expectedBehavior.markerDisplay: Each cell shows \marker prefix before content
expectedBehavior.filterEmpty: Empty filter shows all paragraph markers
expectedBehavior.verseMerging: Verses within paragraph merged into single cell

verificationNotes: Empty filter includes all paragraph markers
